Meanwhile, on Earth, Arlo's search for his family has led him to an unexpected place where he makes contact with another young dinosaur named Ellie (voiced by Blair Underwood). While Arlo and Ellie are initially wary of each other, they gradually come to understand each other better as they share stories about their past experiences.
